variables.name: xz

variables.name: dsu
variables.description: grid distance in s-direction, centered around u-point

variables.name: dsv
variables.description: grid distance in s-direction, centered around v-point

variables.name: dsz

variables.name: dsc
variables.description: grid distance in s-direction, centered around c-point

variables.name: dnu

variables.name: dnc
variables.description: grid distance in n-direction, centered around c-point

variables.name: dsdnui

variables.description: inverse of grid cell surface, centered around v-point

variables.name: dsdnzi
variables.description: inverse of grid cell surface, centered around z-point

variables.name: sdist
variables.description: cum. distance from offshore boundary along s-direction

variables.name: ndist
variables.description: cum. distance from right boundary along n-direction

variables.name: xori
variables.description: x-origin of grid in world coordinate

variables.description: minimum angle of computational wave grid (cart. in rad)

variables.description: wave angles directional distribution w.r.t. comp. x-axis

variables.description: cos of wave angles relative to grid direction

variables.description: sin of wave angles relative to grid direction

variables.name: zs0
variables.description: water level due to tide alone

variables.name: tideinpt
variables.description: input time of input tidal signal

variables.description: incident bound wave velocity in, x-component

variables.description: incident bound wave velocity in, y-component

variables.description: GLM velocity in cell centre, y-component

variables.description: Eulerian velocity in cell centre, y-component

variables.description: Advection velocity sediment in cell centre, y-component

variables.description: depth-averaged suspended concentration for each sediment fraction

variables.name: usd
variables.description: return flow due to roller after breaker delay

variables.description: reflected velocity at bnds in u-points

variables.description: D15 grain diameters for all sediment classses

variables.name: D50
variables.description: D50 grain diameters for all sediment classses

variables.name: D90
variables.description: D90 grain diameters for all sediment classses

variables.name: sedcal
variables.description: equilibrium sediment concentartion factor for each sediment class

variables.name: ucrcal
variables.description: calibration factor for u critical for each sediment class

variables.name: Tsg
variables.description: sediment response time for each sediment class

variables.description: suspended sediment transport for each sediment class (excluding pores), x-component

variables.description: suspended sediment transport for each sediment class (excluding pores), y-component

variables.description: bed sediment transport for each sediment class (excluding pores), x-component

variables.name: Svbg
variables.description: bed sediment transport for each sediment class (excluding pores), y-component

variables.description: depth-averaged bed equilibrium concentration for each sediment class

variables.name: ceqsg
variables.description: depth-averaged suspended equilibrium concentration for each sediment class

variables.name: ua
variables.description: time averaged flow velocity due to wave assymetry

variables.name: BR
variables.description: maximum wave surface slope used in roller dissipation formulation

variables.name: kb
variables.description: near bed turbulence intensity due to depth induces breaking

variables.name: Tbore
variables.description: wave period interval associated with breaking induced turbulence

variables.name: dzav
variables.description: total bed level change due to avalanching

variables.name: gwheadb
variables.description: groundwater head at bottom (differs from gwlevel)

variables.name: gwheight
variables.description: vertical size of aquifer through which groundwater can flow

variables.name: gwbottom
variables.description: level of the bottom of the aquifer

variables.name: gww
variables.description: groundwater flow in z-direction (interaction between surface and ground water)

variables.name: gwcurv
variables.description: curvature coefficient of groundwater head function

variables.name: dinfil
variables.description: Infiltration layer depth used in quasi-vertical flow model for groundwater

variables.name: infil
variables.description: Rate of exchange of water between surface and groundwater (positive from sea to groundwater)

variables.name: gw0back
variables.description: boundary condition back boundary for groundwater head

variables.name: Kzinf
variables.description: (Turbulent) Hydraulic conductivity in z-direction for infiltration

variables.name: kturb
variables.description: depth averaged turbulence intensity due to long wave breaking

variables.name: depo_im
variables.description: implicit bed deposition rate per fraction

variables.name: depo_ex
variables.description: explicit bed deposition rate per fraction

variables.name: nd
variables.description: number of bed layers (can be different for each computational cell)

variables.name: ureps
variables.description: representative flow velocity for sediment advection and diffusion, x-component

variables.name: vreps
variables.description: representative flow velocity for sediment advection and diffusion, y-component

variables.name: urepb
variables.description: representative flow velocity for sediment advection and diffusion, x-component

variables.name: vrepb
variables.description: representative flow velocity for sediment advection and diffusion, y-component

variables.name: dU
variables.description: u-velocity difference between two vertical layers (reduced 2-layer non-hydrostatic model)

variables.name: dV
variables.description: v-velocity difference between two vertical layers (reduced 2-layer non-hydrostatic model)

variables.name: ws
variables.description: vertical velocity at the free surface

variables.name: wscrit
variables.description: critial vertical velocity at the free surface for breaking

variables.name: bedfriccoef
variables.description: dimensional/dimensionless input bed friction coefficient; depends on value of parameter bedfriction

variables.name: Df
variables.description: dissipation rate due to bed friction

variables.name: Dp
variables.description: dissipation rate in the swash due to transformation of kinetic wave energy to potential wave energy

variables.name: Sutot
variables.description: Sediment transport integrated over bed load and suspended and for all sediment grains, x-component

variables.name: Svtot
variables.description: Sediment transport integrated over bed load and suspended and for all sediment grains, y-component

variables.name: cctot
variables.description: Sediment concentration integrated over bed load and suspended and for all sediment grains

variables.description: Surface elevation at boundary due to (short) waves

variables.description: Location at which short wave height for runup is taken
